oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams at the Canton Memorial Auditorium (signed)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Autographs; Grand Ole Opry (Radio program); Holidays; Metal photoplates; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry star Hank Williams and His Drifting Cowboys at the Canton Memorial Auditorium on New Year's Day, January 1, 1953. Poster features a metal photoplate of Hank Williams. Poster is signed by Don Helms, Hillous Butrum, Jerry Rivers, and Bob McNett.
